title: Motivation for Counting
course: Discrete Mathematics by Prof Sudarshan Iyengar

transcript.text: Do not worry about your difficulties in Mathematics.
I can assure you mine are still greater.
Let us count is the title of this chapter.
Probably I am confusing you all.
This sounds like a kindergarten lesson.
Why are we taught how to count?
We of course, know how to count.
So let me ask this question, do you really know how to count?
Do we really know how to count?
Counting is not necessarily counting the number of chocolates in the palm of a kid.
Counting is a lot more than that.
Let me illustrate this with a very nice question.
